entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. 40 percent chance of wet flurries near Whistler early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
